Description:
Converts arbitrary Markdown into HTML.

The Git repo for this module can be found here: http://aka.ms/PowerShellForGitHub
Outputs: [String] The HTML version of the Markdown content.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
ConvertFrom-GitHubMarkdown -Content '**Bolded Text**' -Mode Markdown Returns back '

Bolded Text

'
